pwn.name: Breaking Bad
pwn.desc:
4 b4d h4ck1ng 0nly

I have created new qemu device called volga_rom! To use this device (and to make your life much easier) I also came up with the extremely sophisticated Linux driver: volga_driver.

These are the only things added to the system and you need to h4x0r those.

pwn.desc:
Pon makes no sense

But what does

You?

Me?

No

Only addition and subtraction

Be kind to this binary! It is clumsy as hell, but at least it tries to do its level best.

The password to archive is infected

rev.name: Sneaky
rev.desc: Damn, son, where'd you find this?

rev.name: Warez
rev.desc:
It is 2025. Suddenly, you remember some archaic God forgotten game that you've been playing a lot in your childhood. After some research, you've finally found cd image of this game.

Unfortunately, just like any game released in 200x, it has some DRM protection. No matter how hard you try, you can find neither any mention of the key nor the protection itself.

The urge to play again is unbearable, so you decided to do the most radical thing. You open up ida.exe...

web.name: Cloud
web.desc:
Living in the cloud is quite a thrill,
But not everyone’s allowed, still.
CTF — that’s where it’s at,
Where all the bugs are spotted flat!

IP addresses, ports, and flags,
Know these things and fix the lags!
If you want to be the best,
Break a defense, pass the test!

A secret hides up in the Cloud,
Ready on the server, proud.
CTF — a trail so grand,
Chase it quick, or it’ll slip from hand!

Dreaming of that security fame?
Learn it well and don’t forget the name:
CTF’s a game, it’s true,
And in the Cloud, the defense is you!

web.name: nasOS
web.desc: 👽 I'm an alien I'm a illegal alien 👽
